com.valentine.esp.statemachines

Class GetAllSweeps

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.valentine.esp.statemachines.GetAllSweeps

  • public class GetAllSweeps
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class that combines all the currently set custom sweeps into one ArrayList Used internally by the ValentineClient Class

    • Constructor Detail

      • GetAllSweeps

        public GetAllSweeps(boolean _clearCacheBeforeRead,
            Devices _valentineType,
            ValentineESP _valentineESP,
            java.lang.Object _callbackObject,
            java.lang.String _callbackFunction,
            java.lang.Object _errCallbackObject,
            java.lang.String _errCallbackFunction)
        Constructor for the GetAllSweeps state machine.
        Parameters:
        _clearCacheBeforeRead - - If true, the ValentineClient sweep data cache will be cleared before data is read.
        _valentineType - - The V1 type to use when building requests.
        _valentineESP - - The connected ValentineESP object to use for all requests and packet registrations
        _callbackObject - - The object to use in the callback once the state machine completes all of its steps.
        _callbackFunction - - The method in _callbackObject to use for the callback once the state machine completes all of its steps.
        _errCallbackObject - - The callback object to receive error callbacks.
        _errCallbackFunction - - The name of the method that will receive error notifications.

    • Method Detail

      • getSweeps

        public void getSweeps()
        This is the entry point for the GetAllSweeps state machine.

      • abort

        public void abort()
        This method will set a flag to abort the state machine. The state machine will be stopped on the next data callback after this method is called.

      • getSweepSectionsCallback

        public void getSweepSectionsCallback(ResponseSweepSections _resp)
        This callback method is used to advance the state machine. DO NOT CALL THIS METHOD DIRECTLY.
        Parameters:
        _resp - - The Sweep Sections received from the V1

      • getNumberOfSweepsCallback

        public void getNumberOfSweepsCallback(ResponseMaxSweepIndex _resp)
        This callback method is used to advance the state machine. DO NOT CALL THIS METHOD DIRECTLY.
        Parameters:
        _resp - The maximum sweep index received from the V1.

      • getDefaultSweepDefsCallback

        public void getDefaultSweepDefsCallback(ResponseDefaultSweepDefinitions _resp)
        This callback method is used to advance the state machine. DO NOT CALL THIS METHOD DIRECTLY. This is the last step in the state machine. Once all sweep definitions are received, the callback set up in the constructor will be called.
        Parameters:
        _resp - The sweep definition received from the V1.

      • getSweepsCallback

        public void getSweepsCallback(ResponseSweepDefinitions _resp)
        This callback method is used to advance the state machine. DO NOT CALL THIS METHOD DIRECTLY. This is the last step in the state machine. Once all sweep definitions are received, the callback set up in the constructor will be called.
        Parameters:
        _resp - The sweep definition received from the V1.
